required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Pregnancy Outcome and Vitamin D Level Among Vitamin D Supplementation During Pregnancy
clinical_study.official_title: Pregnancy Outcomes and Vitamin D Level Among Vitamin D Supplementation During Pregnancy : A Double-blind Randomized Placebo Controlled Trial

brief_summary.textblock: To compared pregnancy outcome (Serum vitamin D level in mother and infant , preeclampsia rate, preterm birth rate, Infant birth weight, Infant length , APGAR score) between pregnant women who were given vitamin D supplementation and pregnant women who were given placebo

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Serum 25-OH vitamin D level in pregnant women
Serum 25-OH vitamin D level in umbilicalcord blood

secondary_outcome.description: Measure by clinical and laboratory of preeclampsia à¹‰high blood pressure ( >= 140/90 mmHg) with proteinuria (UPCI > 0.3 mg/dL or Urine protein 24 hours > 300 mg) or in absence of proteinuria with new onset of any of the following thrombocytopenia : Platelet count less than 100,000 x 10^9 /L Serum creatinine > 1.1 mg/dL or doubling of the serum creatinine Elevated liver transaminases to twice normal Pulmonary edema New onset headache unresponsive to medication Visual symptom

Measure at delivery time score 10/10 Appearance : Cyanotic, pale all over = 0 , Peripheral cyanotic only = 1 , Pink = 2 Pulse : 0 bpm = 0 , <100 = 1, 100-140 = 2 Grimace : no response to stimulation = 0 , Grimace(facial movement ,weak cry) = 1 Cry when stimulated = 2 Activity (tone) : floppy = 0 , Some flexion = 1 , Well flexed and resisting extension = 2 Respiration : Apnoeic = 0 , Slow irregular = 1 , Strong cry = 2

clinical_study.condition: Pregnancy Outcome Among Vitamin D Supplementation During Pregnancy

arm_group.description: Vitamin D2 20000 IU 1 tab oral weekly start at GA 18 -22 weeks until delivery
Placebo drug (Appearance same as Vitamin D2) 1 tab oral weekly start at GA 18 -22 weeks until delivery

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Thai female
- Singleton pregnancy
- Age at 18 years old or more
- Gestational age at 18-22 weeks
- Accept to enroll
Exclusion Criteria:
- Pregnant women who not planned to delivery at Rajavithi hospital
- Abnormal kidney function
- Use antiepileptic drugs , or vitamin D supplementation
- Allergy to vitamin D
- Who were diagnosed as vitamin D deficiency
